summary.para: Gets the for the folder object.

param.name: ppidl
param.para: The address of an pointer. This PIDL represents the absolute location of the folder and must be relative to the desktop. This is typically a copy of the PIDL passed to .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: If the folder object has not been initialized, this method returns S_FALSE and ppidl is set to NULL.

summary.para: Exposes methods that obtain information from Shell folder objects.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the , interfaces, from which it inherits.
When implementing a Shell namespace extension, specifically the interface, you need to implement this interface so that the Shell folder object's can be retrieved.
